enableText2command.label: Enable text2command for this state
enableText2command.help: When enabled, the received message is send to the configured text2command instance.

enableCommands.label: Enable discord commands for this state
enableCommands.help: Make this state available for discord commands.

commandsName.label: Name
commandsName.help: A name for this object. Leave empty to use the object name. Must not exceed 100 chars.

commandsAlias.label: Alias
commandsAlias.help: An ID alias for this object. Leave empty to use the object ID. Must not exceed 100 chars.

commandsAllowGet.label: Allow get
commandsAllowGet.help: Allow to get the state value by discord slash commands.

commandsAllowSet.label: Allow set
commandsAllowSet.help: Allow to set the state value by discord slash commands.

commandsShowAckFalse.label: Show ack=false
commandsShowAckFalse.help: Show an information on get commands if the state is not acknowledged.

commandsBooleanValueTrue.label: True value
commandsBooleanValueTrue.help: Value to be shown if the state is true.

commandsBooleanValueFalse.label: False value
commandsBooleanValueFalse.help: Value to be shown if the state is false.

commandsNumberDecimals.label: Decimals
commandsNumberDecimals.help: Decimals to round the value to.

commandsStringSendAsFile.label: Send as file
commandsStringSendAsFile.help: Value should be treated as path or url to a file or base64 encoded file content. The file will be send as an attachment.
